## ğŸ› Bug Fixes

### Fix issue causing tinylicious to stall on CI runs

Ensures `runner.stop()` is called when listening to `SIGINT`, `SIGQUIT`, and `SIGHUP` signals.

#### Change details

Affected packages:

-   @fluidframework/server-services-shared
